change.changenote: Section 3 (1) definition of "commercial passenger vehicle" BEFORE amended by 2007-41-90, effective November 30, 2007 (BC Reg 399/2007).

definition.def: means a motor vehicle operated on a roadway by or on behalf of a person who charges or collects compensation for the transportation of passengers in that motor vehicle, and includes a vehicle operated by or on behalf of the British Columbia Transit Authority or the Greater Vancouver Transportation Authority to provide a regularly scheduled public passenger transportation service;
